title: Screen a Rental Application
description: A prospective tenant has submitted an application for a rental unit. The agent must perform a background and credit check.

tasks.description: Retrieve the new rental application from the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the applicant and the property they applied for.

tasks.description: Run a credit check and criminal background check using the applicant's provided information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully runs the checks through an integrated service.

tasks.description: Review the screening report against the property's qualifying criteria (e.g., credit score > 650, no evictions) and approve or deny the application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes an accurate decision based on the report and criteria.
